website_summaries.verdict: A great choice if you want something a bit different than standard vanity strip lighting.
pros: Provides plenty of light for most spaces
Modern, contemporary style with a high-end feel
cons: Can be difficult to install in small bathrooms
Some minor flaws such as rough edges

customer_reviews.title: Better than anticipated and perfect for our new home!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happily surprised at the high-end look and feel of these Linea di Liara Brio Polished Chrome wall sconces. We're building a new home with high-end finishes but ended up over budget at the end and I had to buy less expensive light fixtures for our Jack & Jill bath. These actually look better than the ones I got for the master bath which cost twice as much. I'm attaching 3 photos but they look much better in real life. My husband is an electrician and installed these. He said he had no problems but to note that there are side-mount cover screws and you need to have the ability to get around your mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on all counts
customer_reviews.text: Took me forever to find a fixture that could be both athseticly pleasing- sconce; and functional -bathroom vanity lights w/o the glare. We have two LED recessed lights in sofit, and full wall mirror. I wanted lights for bumper walls (side walls) but couldn't find anything with all the criteria needed: Smaller physical projection-less than 6" Chrome Moisture tolerant Dimmer capability Bulb flexibility- incandescent or LEDs Washable/wipeable surface Perk- glass lamps are subtle & of good quality AND can be swapped out for globes or whatever your space or mood calls for : )

customer_reviews.text: The lights are beautiful and offer exactly the ambiance we want in the bathroom. Delivery was prompt and the two lights arrived in excellent condition. Very pleased with this company and product.
customer_reviews.author: James H Moran

customer_reviews.title: Better than shown!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. Much prettier than shown. People comment on them all of the time and ask where I got them. I have them on both sides of my unframed bathroom mirror. Nice clean look. Very sharp looking.
customer_reviews.author: Janet G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, and look great in my new bathroom. Came very well packaged for safe transit.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Modern, Well-Made Sconce.
customer_reviews.text: The sconce is modern with the clean lines that I was looking for. It is solid and well made and the globe is real glass. I bought two and am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Will update after installation hopefully with an additional star because they are truly beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these lights. I am giving them four stars for appearance only, as I haven't installed them as yet and won't be for a while. Will update after installation hopefully with an additional star because they are truly beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Chico

customer_reviews.title: Attractive lighting at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These lights are well made and very attractive. We have two of them in our hallways. This was a great buy and a great update to our home.
